responses: Hello! How can I help you with GrabFood today?
Hi! What can I assist you with regarding your order?

patterns: How do I place an order?
How can I order food on GrabFood?
How do I make an order?
responses: You can place an order by selecting a restaurant, adding items to your cart, and checking out.
Simply browse restaurants, choose your meals, and confirm payment to place an order.
GrabFood supports cash, credit/debit cards, and e-wallets.
You can pay using cash, cards, or supported GrabPay services.
Delivery usually takes between 30 to 60 minutes depending on distance and restaurant preparation time.
Estimated delivery time will be shown before you confirm your order.

patterns: How do I get a refund?
Can I get my money back?
responses: Refunds are provided if there is an issue with your order, such as missing or incorrect items.
You can request a refund through the Grab app under order history.
You can contact Grab support through the Help Center in the app.
Grab customer support is available 24/7 to assist you.
